wjhk.jupload2.policies

Class SilverpeasUploadPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • wjhk.jupload2.policies.DefaultUploadPolicy
      • wjhk.jupload2.policies.SilverpeasUploadPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UploadPolicy

    public class SilverpeasUploadPolicy
extends DefaultUploadPolicy
    Personnalised Policy with no button : use only DragAndDrop or Copy/Paste with automatic upload.
    This is given as an example of a personnalized policy to show how JUpload is easy to adapt to your specific needs.
    • support for updating the background color.
    • load an HTML page to be displayed as a message into the Applet: allows a 'richer' label.
    • pre-validation of files size (when they are added, instead of before upload).
    Author:
    ehsavoie
